title: Square Root
text: Take the square root of both sides
speech: Take the square root of both sides
pacedSpeech: Take the square root of both sides

title: Positive and Negative
text: Remember that taking the square root of $$36$$ results in one positive number and one negative number!
speech: Remember that taking the square root of  36  results in one positive number and one negative number!
pacedSpeech: Remember that taking the square root of   36
results in one positive number and one negative number!
